      • getInstance

                                      java.lang.String communityId)

      • getInstance

        public static SyncManager getInstance(UserAccount account,
                                      java.lang.String communityId,
                                      SmartStore smartStore)
        Returns the instance of this class associated with this user, community and smartstore.
        Parameters:
        account - User account. Pass null to user current user.
        communityId - Community ID. Pass null if not applicable
        smartStore - SmartStore instance. Pass null to use current user default smartstore.
        Returns:
        Instance of this class.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the sync manager It might take a while for active syncs to actually get stopped Call isStopped() to see if syncManager is fully paused

      • isStopping

        public boolean isStopping()
        Returns:
        true if stop was requested but there are still active syncs

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()
        Returns:
        true if stop was requested and there no syncs are active anymore

      • checkAcceptingSyncs

        public void checkAcceptingSyncs()
        Check if syncs are allowed to run Throw a SyncManagerStoppedException if sync manager is stopping/stopped
